prompts: Create a whimsical psychic-type Pokemon with playful characteristics and vibrant colors.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that uses its psychic powers in creative ways.
Imagine a pink and blue Pokemon with clown-like features and a mischievous smile.
Generate a unique design for a psychic Pokemon that thrives in urban environments.
Make a character that embodies the essence of a psychic performer with colorful accents.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that uses its psychic abilities for entertainment.
Design a playful Pokemon that has a mixture of pink and blue colors and a quirky body shape.
